articles.title: EU advises against second AstraZeneca shot for people with blood clots - Reuters
articles.description: The second shot of the COVID-19 vaccine developed by AstraZeneca and the University of Oxford must not be given to anyone who has had blood clots with low blood platelets after receiving the first, Europe's medicines regulator said on Friday.
